title.rendered: Metro line from Greater Noida in Talks

content.rendered:
While the people in Noida have already been rejoicing with the news of Jewar Airport underway, there’s yet another reason for them to cheer. The announcement of setting up a Metro link that stretches for 29 kilometers between Greater Noida and the Airport underway.

This news has been confirmed by, The Yamuna Expressway Industrial Development Authority (YEIDA). After they officially approved a Techno Economic Feasibility Report (TEFR), making property near Jewar Airport seem like hot-cakes of the real estate world.

The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation(DMRC) is responsible for producing a Detailed Project Report (DPR) after carrying out requisite studies to understand and assess the viability of this Metro line.

According to an official statement released by YEIDA Officials on Tuesday, this report is expected soon. This much-hyped line will be connected to the Aqua line that was launched recently and connects Noida with Greater Noida.
